1.Title: Information
1.Description: I'm confident I have the experience and the skills to succeed in an internship working alongside professionals. At any point just send me an email if you'd like to contact me! I would be honored if I've piqued your curiosity.

2.Description: You can find me here at my social media. You'll be able to see the projects I've worked on and am working on, and gain of sense of my abilities!
